name: Knock Down Shooter
description:
This is a game made for an event/challenge held recently and this game might need some improvement but this is what I was able to do in 2 days (weekend). This game is based on raiderop's idea; if you don't know about this event, lemme explain. This event asks you to give an idea and we choose one of the ideas to make a game on the weekend. If you want to know more join our discord server: https://discord.io/codekeys+

OFC TAKE A SCREENSHOT OF YOUR FIRST  DEATH AND POST IT IN OUR DISCORD SERVER FOR ROASTI- I MEAN FUN PURPOSES.

CONTROLS:

Click to shoot
Aim with mouse
Move from knock-back (recoil) force. The more distant you aim the more recoil force is exerted on the player (I mean these are simple physics, if you don't understand this, then.....).
Click Esc to close the game

IMPORTANT NOTE: My recent game was played by a few ppl and some of them had been saying that the game was too challenging. So, If you somehow live under a rock and you don't know the ABCD of gaming, then I am afraid this game is not for you.
